name: Phoenix Strike
description:
In a casual game with a top view, you have to control military equipment from a Quad bike to a tank (only 4 types). During the passage of the location, you need to break enemy ambushes, but also collect keys to get to the boss. Defeating the boss will open access to the next level.

Features:

- six unique levels and bosses;
- ability to play together on the same computer using the keyboard;
- upgrade of military equipment as the game progresses.
